response.overview: After news of a tragic snow storm in Changtang (Ladakh) reaches him, a Kashmiri man quits his job and embarks on a journey to become a shepherd. Six years later, he starts the Pashmina Goat Project - an NGO to protect the Changpa community and their goats from the harsh implications of climate change in the region.
response.title: The Call of Pashmina
